STICK INJURY (CONT’D)
270
Immunization for Adults

--- Page 292 ---
PRINCIPLES
RISK FACTORS FOR SPECIFIC ORGANISMS
 HBV
household
contacts/sexual
partners
of
hepatitis patients, IDU, homosexual, multiple sex
ual partners, tattoo, piercing, transfusions, health
care workers (prior to vaccine era), residents/work
ers of institutions for mentally ill or criminals, birth
in endemic country
 HCV
sexual partners (controversial), IDU, tattoo,
piercing, transfusions, residents/workers of institu
tions for mentally ill or criminals

PNEUMOCOCCAL,
MENINGOCOCCAL,
HAEMOPHILUS
INFLUENZAE
splenectomy
CONTRAINDICATIONS

ALL VACCINES
anaphylaxis, severe illness

LIVE VACCINES
pregnancy, immunocompromised
(steroids, AIDS but not HIV, malignancies)
SIDE EFFECTS
local erythema, fever
PRINCIPLES (CONT’D)
